definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

sentences.english: The Restoration is an important transformable age in the history of finance and taxation in England .
sentences.chinese: 復辟時期是英國財政與稅收史上的一個重要轉型時代。

sentences.english: Mio Wei stressed that over the next five years is the critical period of China's industrial transformation and upgrading.
sentences.chinese: 苗圩強調，未來五年是我國工業轉型升級的攻堅時期。

sentences.english: In this transformation process, Sino-Japanese War plays an important role.
sentences.chinese: 在這一轉型過程中，甲午戰爭發揮了重要作用。

sentences.english: The fifth chapter mainly discusses its transfer during Wei and Jin dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 第五章主要討論相和歌辭在魏晉時期的轉型問題。

sentences.english: At present, China is in the transformation period of new and old systems.
sentences.chinese: 當前，我國處在新舊體制的轉型期。

sentences.english: In these shifting conditions, opportunities to innovate will abound.
sentences.chinese: 在這個轉型時期，充滿了創新的機遇。

sentences.english: China has been entering an overall accelerative transformation period by now.
sentences.chinese: 中國目前已經進入全面加速轉型期。

sentences.english: Over these past decades, China has transformed itself totally.
sentences.chinese: 在過去的數十年中，中國進行了全方位的改革轉型。

sentences.english: The Ming-Qing Period is a critical transitional period of Bai culture.
sentences.chinese: 明清時期，是白族文化發生重大轉型的關鍵時期。

sentences.english: That's why Yu-Fu Era is considered as the transfer time of ancient Shu.
sentences.chinese: 由此可見魚鳧時代爲古蜀社會轉型期。

sentences.english: Morris Chang is living proof of Taiwan's ability to transform its economy.
sentences.chinese: 張忠謀是臺灣經濟轉型能力的見證人之一。

sentences.english: The Relationship among Leader Types, Follower Types and Leadership …
sentences.chinese: 轉型領導與家長式領導的探究省思。

sentences.english: Wang Guowei is the first person to achieve modern transformation of academic research in China.
sentences.chinese: 王國維是中國學術研究實現現代轉型的第一人。

sentences.english: The evolution of Henan University went with modern city transition of Kaifeng.
sentences.chinese: 河南大學的變遷順應了近代開封的城市轉型。

sentences.english: Third, we will steadily carry out upgrading of processing trade.
sentences.chinese: 三是穩步推進加工貿易轉型升級。

sentences.english: Wenzhou’s transformation resulted almost entirely from free-market policies.
sentences.chinese: 溫州的轉型幾乎完全是因爲自由市場政策。

definition: innovation/to bring forth new ideas/to blaze new trails
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already
